text: Sonja Aldén, born 20 December 1977, in St Albans, England, UK, is a Swedish singer.Discogs In 2006, 2007 and 2012 she participated at Melodifestivalen. She has also worked together with Shirley Clamp and Sanna Nielsen. Also, she has written songs for other artists, like hard rock/heavy metal band The Poodles, who also participated in the Swedish Melodifestivalen 2006 with the song Night of Passion. She has attended the Adolf Fredrik's Music School in Stockholm. ==Discography== ===Albums=== Year Album Peak Position Certifications SWE SwedishCharts.com: Sonja Aldén page 2007 Till dig 2 2008 Under mitt tak 3 2012 I gränslandet 12 2013 I andlighetens rum 4 2014 Jul i andlighetens rum 6 ===Joint albums=== Title Details Peak positions Certifications SWE Our Christmas Sanna, Shirley & Sonja) * First joint album * Released: November 2008 1 * SWE: Platinum Vår jul Sanna, Shirley & Sonja) * Second joint album * Released: November 2010 6 * SWE: Gold ===Singles=== Year Single Peak Position Album SWE 2006 "Etymon" (credited as Sonya) 35 2007 "För att du finns" 3 "Här står jag" 16 2008 "Nån som du" 29 "Du får inte" 17 ;as Sanna, Shirley, Sonja Year Single Peak Position Album SWE 2008 "All I Want For Christmas" 39 Our Christmas "My Grown Up Christmas List" 41 Our Christmas ==References== == Other websites == * Official Website (In Swedish) Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish singers Category:Musicians from Hertfordshire Category:People from St Albans
